channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Grief, Then Paperwork: The Messy, Thankless Job of an Estate Executor
item.description: The role can also entail tracking down heirs and family drama.

item.title: ‘We live on a fixed income’: My husband and I are retired. We’re invited to our niece’s destination wedding. Are we obliged to buy a gift?
item.description: “We haven’t been to a wedding in decades.”

item.title: The New Era of Clean Energy: Transcontinental Power Lines
item.description: British homes would be powered with African energy under an ambitious plan.

item.title: ‘She told my grandchildren lies about me so they would despise me’: I’m disinheriting my ungrateful and selfish daughter. Could she contest my will?
item.description: “I once complimented my daughter and her partner on a nice plant in their garage and they started laughing, and told me it was marijuana.”

item.title: 6% of Your Paycheck Is Becoming the New Standard for 401(k) Saving
item.description: Workers are putting a record share of their income toward retirement. Employers’ automatic savings plans help explain why.

item.title: ‘Our children have varying degrees of success’: My husband and I are in our 80s and have $300,000 to leave our 3 kids. Do we give more to our underemployed son?
item.description: “At 56, he has few prospects for his future.”

item.title: Crypto Platforms to Report Tax Information to IRS Starting in 2026
item.description: In a long-awaited step against tax evasion in cryptocurrency markets, the Treasury Department adopted a final rule requiring many crypto platforms to ...

item.title: ‘We, his children, do not trust her’: My elderly father is recently widowed. His new girlfriend is putting him under pressure to get married. What can we do?
item.description: “We are so worried she will convince him to sneak off and marry at the courthouse.”

item.title: Big Banks Boost Dividends After Passing Stress Tests
item.description: Goldman, Morgan Stanley and others detailed their capital plans on Friday.

item.title: Warren Buffett and other billionaires are buying blue-chip energy stocks. Here’s why.
item.description: The energy sector is keeping the lights on for investors.
